original_title: Snoop Dogg Puff Puff Pass Tour
overview: Roll with Bigg Snoop Dogg and live the life of the Puff Puff Pass Tour! Following Snoop along 29 cities, the tour entertained half a million rabid fans! Kick back, light one up, and watch how Snoop and crew prepare and unwind from such massive pressures!
title: Snoop Dogg Puff Puff Pass Tour
